price: Ka ce: "Allah Ya yi gaskiya, sabõda haka ku bi aƙĩdar Ibrãhĩma mai karkata zuwa ga gaskiya; kuma bai kasance daga mãsu shirki ba."
arabic: قُلۡ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُۗ فَٱتَّبِعُواْ مِلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفٗاۖ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul ṣadaqa al-lahu fa-ittabiʿū millata ib'rāhīma ḥanīfan wamā kāna mina al-mush'rikīna
